content: the granny stitch is one that many beginners master and this pattern uses the stitch in a corner to corner technique c2c which when used with variegated yarn shows the colours in the most beautiful way you can create your own beautiful crochet scarf with the nobody puts granny in the corner patter which is a perfect beginner crochet pattern the pattern comes with detailed photos to help you complete this project ***pattern details*** - uk terms & us terms - file type pdf - page size a4 210mm x 297mm - language english - download will include 2 x colour pdf 1 x uk terms & 1 x us terms - hook size 6mm the finished item measures 210cm long x 20cm wide suggested yarn 3 x balls of hayfield spirit chunky don t forget to follow and tag me on social media facebook www facebook com/cosyrosieuk instagram @cosyrosieuk www cosyrosieuk com ***important*** - i do not accept returns or refunds - please do not copy or claim as your own - you may sell physical product versions of these however please credit me as the designer - please do not sell the pdf - if you have any questions please contact me via the contact option on my page or pop me an email at fiona@cosyrosieuk co uk all design and photos are copyright of cosy rosie uk fiona field © 2020
